name: h3
description: The 2025 DeMarini Prism+ Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat is a game-changer for slap hitters seeking a balanced swing feel. Certified by USSSA 1.20, ASA (USA Softball), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat ensures top-notch performance across various leagues. Its two-piece composite construction features a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter, with a Gapped Wall Composite design made from seamless carbon fiber that enhances strength and expands the sweet spot. The Continuous Fiber Composite Barrel boosts power, while the Type V Prism+ Connection maximizes barrel performance. With a striking black, white, and multi-colored barrel, this bat also includes a Refract End Cap to help generate superior bat speed. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
